si.title: පරීක්ෂක ජෙනරාල්ගේ අර්බුදය විසඳන්න
body_lines: පවෙල් සංවිධානයේ විධායක අධ්යක්ෂ රොහානා හෙට්ටියාරාචි මහතා මෙම අභියාචනය කළේ ජනාධිපතිවරයාගේ ලිපියකින්.
පසුගිය වසර හය තුළ, දේශීය අපේක්ෂකයින් තෝරා පත් කර ගැනීමේ අයිතිය මහජනතාවට ලබා දී නොමැත.
වසර පහකට පසු ජනතාවට තම ජනාධිපති තෝරා පත් කර ගැනීමට ජනතාවට මෙම අවස්ථාව පිළිබඳ බොහෝ අවිනිශ්චිතතාවයක් තිබේ.
දේශපාලනය නොමැතිකම සඳහා ජනාධිපතිවරයකු ලෙස ඔබට ඉඩ නොදිය යුතුය.
පොලිස්පති නොමැති නිසා මැතිවරණය බලපා ඇති නම්, ඔබේ යුතුකම ඉටු කිරීම සඳහා ඔබ විධායක ජනාධිපති ලෙස පොලිස්පතිවරයා පොලිස්පතිවරයා ලෙස පත් කළ යුතුය.
ජනාධිපතිවරයාගේ පදනම මත ඔබ විසින් ප්රකාශ කර ඇති බැඳීම් ඔබ අපේක්ෂා කරමු.
ස්වාධීන සාධාරණ මැතිවරණයක් පැවැත්වීමට මැතිවරණ කොමිසමට උදව් කරන ලෙස අපි ඉල්ලා සිටිමු.

en.title: Resolve the crisis of the Inspector General
body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has called for a solution to the issue that has been created by the Inspector General of Police, and the Election Monitoring Organization, the Election Monitoring Organization, has called for the preservation of the people's voting rights by ensuring that the presidential election is independent.
The Executive Director of the Powell Organization Rohana Hettiarachchi made this appeal in a letter to the President.
For the past six years, the public has not been given the right to elect local candidates.
There have been many uncertainty over this opportunity for the people to elect their president after five years.
You should not be allowed as a president for the lack of politics.
If the election is affected by the absence of the Inspector General of Police, you should appoint the Inspector General of Police as the Executive President to fulfill your duty.
We expect you to fulfill the obligations that you have been declared in the constitution on the basis of the President.
We appeal to help the Election Commission to hold an independent fair election.

summary_lines: President Wickremesinghe seeks resolution to the crisis caused by the Inspector General of Police, affecting the independence of the upcoming presidential election. The Election Monitoring Organization urges the preservation of voters' rights and calls for an independent election process. The Powell Organization's Executive Director, Rohana Hettiarachchi, appeals to the President to ensure the election's integrity and address the public's long-standing inability to elect local leaders. The letter emphasizes the importance of political neutrality and suggests appointing the Inspector General of Police as the Executive President to maintain fairness in the election.
